eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Georgia; AT 12:35 PM ON SEP 17, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 06:35 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: FROM THE GEORGIA EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT AGENCY AND THE GEORGIA OFFICE OF HOMELAND SECURITY THIS IS THE REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST OF THE EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM
